name: Train Surfer
description:
Train Surfer is a game I created to replicate the popular mobile game Subway Surfers. The main difference however is that in my version you play as the train instead.

Controls:

  • Left: A/Left Arrow
  • Right: D/Right Arrow

Credit:

  • Tangara Sydney Tain - PolyDucky (Sketchfab) -  https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0
  • Thomas the Tank Engine with Annie & Clarabel - Sea Lan Air (Sketchfab) -  https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0
